description: A small utility that sorts all files in a directory into subdirectories(YYYMMDD) according to their creation time (ctime).

info.Package Index Owner:: ckauhaus, ctheune, DanielHavlikGocept, sweh, tlotze, icemac, zagy, wosc

longdescription: A small utility that sorts all files in a directory into subdirectories(YYYMMDD) according to their creation time (ctime).
